note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, the prevalence of anxiety disorders is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Share of population with anxiety disorders vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Estimated share of people with  [anxiety disorders](#dod:anxiety_disorders), whether or not they are diagnosed, based on representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.

display.name: Share of population with anxiety disorders
